<title level="1" pfs="">[Spy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3421)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Any number of nobles could be spies—a beloved confidante of the queen or even the court jester. Spies use their skills to subtly manipulate courtiers, turn enemies against one another, and collect valuable information.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Spy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3421)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 15

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +16, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +14, [Local Court Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +16, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +16, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Noble's Ally** The spy has positioned themself to seem a trusted ally, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=2391) or to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=2392) among the nobles of that court.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [fine clothes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2715), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=391)_, [Thieves' Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +14 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 90

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_rapier_ +17 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+7 piercing

**Hidden Blade** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The spy draws a weapon and then Strikes with it. The target of the Strike is off-guard against the attack.

**Sneak Attack**   The spy deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>
